title: WTB: C46 Joe Mcginnity and Luther Taylor
author: TT40391

posts.post_title: WTB: C46 Joe Mcginnity and Luther Taylor
posts.post_content:
Hello everyone, I am becoming more and more interested in minor league issues and I would like to buy a C46 Joe Mcginnity and Luther Taylor.  I am just starting my interest in this set and I do not have any of the cards yet but I would like to start with these two as they are the more difficult ones to find I believe.  The conditon on these cards do not have to be perfect, low condition examples are fine.  If anyone has either of these cards avaliable please message me at [url]wacturner@hotmail.com[/url]  

As always thanks for all your help

TT

There is a C46 Taylor in our current auction if interested. You can click on the Brockelman & Luckey Auction banner at the top of the page to find it. Good luck in your quest.
 
ps...it's lot 263
